articles.author: Ian Sample
articles.title: NHS England announces large-scale trial of potential early cancer test - The Guardian
articles.description: More than 100,000 volunteers aged between 50 and 77 sought to take part in Galleri blood screening
articles.content:
The NHS has launched the worlds largest trial of a potentially gamechanging blood test that aims to detect more than 50 types of cancer before symptoms appear.
More than 100,000 volunteers are being… [+2930 chars]
